queryName: Beta - Nifcloud LB use insecure TLS policy ID
descriptionText: The load balancer uses an insecure TLS policy. This rule flags `nifcloud_load_balancer` resources that either omit `ssl_policy_id` or set `ssl_policy_id` to an outdated policy identifier (`1`, `2`, `3`, `5`, `8`). Resources must use `TLS v1.2+` for secure encryption.
